resources.string: "Enable one or more functions in STAMINA mode to optimize battery time. "
Low battery mode
Low battery mode settings
Note!
"%s sends and receives data in the background, and uses processing power. You may reduce battery consumption by uninstalling it or enabling STAMINA mode. "
Low battery mode

"Low battery mode turns off power consuming features and settings when the battery is below a preset level. Use when battery power is running low and you can't charge your device. You will still receive phone calls and text messages."
"Low battery mode turns off power consuming features and settings when the battery is below a preset level. Use when battery power is running low and you can't charge your device."
Prolongs battery time extensively by keeping only basic phone functions on

"Ultra STAMINA mode will extend battery lifetime significantly. It can be used when you can't charge your device for a long time.
Note that Internet connection through Wi-Fi and Mobile data will be disabled.
Only a few basic functions, such as Phone and Messaging will be available. Tap \"More info\" for more details."
Please wait a short moment, and then try again to activate Ultra STAMINA Mode.
While tethering you cannot use the Internet on your phone. Do you want to continue to tether?
"While tethering you cannot use the Internet on your phone. You may be able to if you choose another network. Please always check the other network's charges. Do you want to continue to tether?"
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone ^1 times. After ^2 more unsuccessful attempts, the phone will be reset to factory default and all user data will be lost.

"With the current exchange settings you are required to encrypt the SD card to be able to access it.
Encryption of the SD card may take several hours depending on the storage capacity.
Encrypt now?"

"Encryption of the SD card was interrupted and cannot be completed. As a result, the data on your SD card is no longer accessible.
You need to format your SD card in order to access the data again."

"You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and app data, media, and other files. After you encrypt your phone, assuming you've set up a screen lock (a pattern or numeric PIN or password), you'll need to unlock the screen to decrypt the phone every time you power it on. The only other way to decrypt is to perform a factory data reset, deleting all your data.
Encryption may take from a few minutes up to an hour or more. Your phone must be fully charged, and your phone plugged in throughout the process. If you interrupt the encryption, you may lose some or all of your data."
Keep notifications on lockscreen

"Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your phone.
Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on the phone to the web.
To select what type of information to sync within each account, go to Settings > Accounts.
Data transmission charges may apply when updates are made to your phone."
View Fixed Dialing Numbers
View Service Dialing Numbers

"You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media, and other files. After you encrypt your phone, assuming you've set up a screen lock (that is, a pattern or numeric PIN or password), you'll need to unlock the screen to decrypt the phone every time you power it on. The only other way to decrypt is to perform a factory data reset, erasing all your data.
Encryption takes an hour or more. You must start with a charged battery and keep your phone plugged in throughout the process. If you interrupt it, you'll lose some or all of your data."
You need to set a lock screen PIN, pattern or password before you can start encryption.
You need to draw your unlock pattern to confirm encrypting your device.
Wait while your phone is being encrypted. ^1% complete.
Wait while your phone is being encrypted. Time remaining: ^1
Warning: Your device will be wiped after ^1 more failed attempts to be unlocked!

"Encryption was interrupted and can't complete. As a result, the data on your phone is no longer accessible.
To resume using your phone, you must perform a factory reset. When you set up your phone after the reset, you'll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google Account. "

"Decryption failed.
To resume using your phone, you need to perform a factory reset. When you set up your phone after the reset, you'll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google Account."

"When this feature is turned on, you can beam app content to another NFC-capable device by holding the devices close together. For example, you can beam Browser pages, YouTube videos, People contacts, and more.

"When this feature is turned on, you can zoom in and out by triple-tapping the screen.
While zoomed in, you can: "
"Pan: Drag two or more fingers across the screen. "
Adjust zoom level: Pinch two or more fingers together or spread them apart."
You can also temporarily magnify what's under your finger by triple-tapping and holding. In this magnified state, you can drag your finger to explore different parts of the screen. Lift your finger to return to your previous state.
Note: Triple-tap for magnification works everywhere except the keyboard and navigation bar."

"When this setting is turned on, you can use screen pinning to keep the current screen in view until you unpin.
To use screen pinning:
1. Make sure screen pinning is turned on.
2. Open the screen you want to pin.
3. Tap Recent apps key.
4. Swipe up and then tap the pin icon."

Mobile Hotspot consumes more battery. Connect the device to an outlet to extend battery life."

"Turn on [Use when screen off] and select apps you wish to run with reduced functionality during sleep mode. The [Battery draining apps] tab shows apps that consume a lot of battery power. The bar below each app indicates battery power consumption."

"Turn on [Use when screen off] and select apps you wish to run with reduced functionality during sleep mode. The [Battery draining apps] tab shows apps that consume a lot of battery power. The bar below each app indicates battery power consumption."

"You can select apps to run with reduced functionality during sleep mode. If selected apps do not function properly, deselect them.
The notification light for all apps flashes in the same color at the same frequency during sleep mode.
STAMINA mode becomes deactivated while charging."

"If selected apps do not function properly, deselect them.
STAMINA mode is deactivated while you are controlling or charging the device."

"STAMINA mode saves battery power by adjusting device settings. You can choose applications to run with reduced functionality during sleep mode. (This helps you save battery power because most apps keep draining the battery even during sleep mode.)
Functions disabled for selected apps: - Wi-Fi - Mobile data - Timer
The notification light for all apps flashes in the same color at the same frequency during sleep mode.
STAMINA mode is deactivated while you are controlling the device."

"STAMINA mode saves battery power by disabling network connections and timer function during sleep mode for your selected apps. (This helps you save battery power because most apps keep draining the battery even during sleep mode.)
STAMINA mode also adjusts display settings to get the most battery life when the screen is on."
Use when screen is off
Adjust device settings (e.g., screen frame rate) and turn off Image enhancement to save power when the screen is on

What is STAMINA mode?" STAMINA mode is Sony’s power save function. It extends the battery lifetime when the display is off.
"Basic usage" To turn on STAMINA mode, tap the button on the screen. When the screen is off, in order to save battery life, Wi-Fi and mobile data will be temporarily disabled, and most applications will be inactive. When the screen is on, your phone will function normally.
"Advanced usage" If you want to keep some apps active while STAMINA is on, please add the apps into the APPS ACTIVE IN STANDBY list. Applications may not work correctly if they are not added to the list.
"Note" If an application doesn’t work correctly, please register the app in APPS ACTIVE IN STANDBY or turn off STAMINA mode."
Airplane mode turns off all network connections, including calling, texting, Internet access, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth.
Adjust priority order
Your carrier
"Where Can I Find carrier's Privacy Policy? Separately, if you have questions about %1$s's Privacy Policy, please visit %2$s and click on the \"Privacy Policy\" link."
"your carrier's homepage"

"Where Can I Find More Information About the 3rd Party's Policies? Check the app's terms of use and/or the app provider's policies for more information about how the app will collect, access, use and disclose your information. Privacy Policies, Terms of Use and other consumer notices MAY BE available on the app provider's website. Be sure you are comfortable with the policies before you use an app."

"Which Privacy Policy Applies? %1$s's Privacy Policy and Terms of Use do not apply to apps on your device that are solely provided by 3rd parties. The 3rd party's policies apply to your use of this app."

%3$s Privacy Alert: If you use a 3rd party app, it may directly collect your personal information or require %2$s to disclose your personal information, including location information (where applicable), to the app provider or some other 3rd party.
Carrier legal

"The internal memory is already encrypted.
By turning on encryption of the SD card, new files and files that are modified will be encrypted and cannot be read in other devices. Already existing files will remain unencrypted as long as they aren't modified.
Note: it is not possible to turn off SD card encryption once it has been turned on."

"With the current Exchange settings, you are required to turn on encryption of the SD card to be able to access it.
Doing this will encrypt new files. Already existing files on the SD card will remain unencrypted until they are modified.
Encrypt now?"

"Encryption of the SD card will prevent new files from being used in other devices. Unaltered files will still be accessible in other devices until they are modified. Please note that turning on SD card encryption is irreversible.
Note: This action cannot be reversed, except by performing a factory reset, erasing all your data."
Insert SD card to activate or tap Next to continue

"Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your device.
Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on the device to the web.
To select what type of information to sync within each account, go to Settings > Accounts.
Data transmission charges may apply when updates are made to your device. An unlimited data plan is recommended."

"STAMINA mode includes:
• Extended standby Saves power when the screen is off by temporarily disabling Wi-Fi. Most applications will be inactive. When the screen is ON, your device will function normally. If you want to keep some apps active while Extended standby is ON, add the apps to the APPS ACTIVE IN STANDBY list.
• Extended usage Saves power when your device is in use by restricting hardware performance. "

"Activate reader mode for the applications you want to use undisturbed. When you use an application in reader mode no other applications are allowed to run. By using only one application at a time you will also save power. "
Lets you use selected applications without getting disturbed by notifications.
Due to security reasons, setting %s as unlock method will clear all registered fingerprints.
